DOC.brief_title: Effects Adding Chickpeas American Diet ( Long Term Study )
DOC.detailed_description: Long-term observational study : Subjects enrol participate observational set three month . During time period , individual encourage , maintain increased legume intake explore new recipe allow maintain diverse menu legume base food . Fecal sample microbiota analysis collect every month . Participants record weekly online questionnaire legume intake GI health well health status update . DOC.criteria: Good Health No systemic antibiotic precede two month No medication suppress immune function Willingness provide basic demographic well medical history data Gastric Ulcers Inflammatory Bowel Disease ( IBD ) Irritable Bowel Syndrome ( IBS ) Chronic constipation/diarrhea Body Mass Index ( BMI ) > 30 Dietary restriction prevent legume intake Currently medication affect GI transit time Consumption > 3 servings/week chickpea > 6 servings/week legume BEFORE study begin
